body:
> @jvehent I looked through the Firefox code and still wasn't able to figure out a origin that works here. I tried chrome: and resource: based on the code I found, but they didn't work.

We ran into something like this with snippets on about:home, it ended up having a blank origin and we couldn't find a way to work around it.
body_text:
@jvehent I looked through the Firefox code and still wasn't able to figure out a origin that works here. I tried chrome: and resource: based on the code I found, but they didn't work.

We ran into something like this with snippets on about:home, it ended up having a blank origin and we couldn't find a way to work around it.
body_html:
@jvehent I looked through the Firefox code and still wasn't able to figure out a origin that works here. I tried chrome: and resource: based on the code I found, but they didn't work.

We ran into something like this with snippets on about:home, it ended up having a blank origin and we couldn't find a way to work around it.
